programme.desc: Caroline introduces the third and final film of the evening, Phantom Ship. This early Hammer Film production released in 1935 stars Bela Lugosi, Shirley Grey and Arthur Margetson. [S]

programme.title: Phantom Ship
programme.desc: 1935. Mystery. Directed by Denison Clift. Stars Bela Lugosi, Shirley Grey & Arthur Margetson. During a terrible storm, the crew of a ship realise a murderer is among them, killing them one by one. [S]

programme.title: Cellar Club with Caroline Munro
programme.desc: After an exciting night of horror fare, it's time to close up. Caroline Munro gives a preview of an eclectic threesome of films for next week. [S]

programme.title: The Eyes
programme.desc: 1960. Drama. Director: Ken Hughes. Stars Reed De Rouen, Jean MacDonald & Tommy Duggan. Very rare and unseen for years! The story of a woman who questions her own sanity.

programme.title: What's On TPTV With Noel
programme.desc: Founder of Talking Pictures TV and one half of the Footage Detectives, Noel Cronin, shares shows and films not to be missed at the end of October and beginning of November. [S]

programme.title: For the Love of Ada
programme.desc: The Eviction. Stars: Wilfred Pickles, Irene Handl & Jack Smethurst. Walter and Ada receive notice of eviction as the council intend to build a bypass where their house currently stands. (S3, E04) [S]

programme.title: Burke's Law
programme.desc: Who Killed Mr. Colby in Ladies' Lingerie? 1965. Stars Gene Barry, Gary Conway & Regis Toomey. The murder of a blackmailing department store maintenance man must be solved but Burke is in Chicago.

programme.title: Big Ben Calling
programme.desc: 1935. Musical about a cafe proprietress, a radio salesman and a composer who set up a pirate radio station. Starring Leslie French, Hughie Green & Mary Lawson. [S]

programme.title: Undercover Girl
programme.desc: 1958. Crime Drama. A reporter on the verge of exposing a drugs ring is killed before he can write the story. Stars Paul Carpenter and Jackie Collins. [S]

programme.title: The Ghost Camera
programme.desc: 1933. Crime drama with Henry Kendall, Ida Lupino (her first full feature) and one of John Mills' early films. A lost camera contains a photo of a murder. [S]

programme.title: Paul Temple's Triumph
programme.desc: 1950. Nettlefold Films production directed by Maclean Rogers and starring John Bentley & Dinah Sheridan. Paul Temple is on the hunt for a kidnapped scientist who's invented a secret formula. [S]

programme.title: Paul Temple's Triumph
programme.desc: 1950. Nettlefold Films production directed by Maclean Rogers and starring John Bentley & Dinah Sheridan. Paul Temple is on the hunt for a kidnapped scientist who's invented a secret formula. [S]

programme.title: What's On TPTV With Noel
programme.desc: Founder of Talking Pictures TV and one half of the Footage Detectives, Noel Cronin, shares shows and films not to be missed at the end of October and beginning of November. [S]

programme.title: Rogue's Yarn
programme.desc: 1956. Crime drama directed by Vernon Sewell. A husband plots to kill his rich wife. Does he have the perfect alibi? Starring Derek Bond and Hugh Latimer. [S]

programme.title: The Brothers
programme.desc: Errors of Judgement. 1973. Stars Jean Anderson, Patrick O'Connell & Jonathan Newth. Hammond Transport is struggling. Brian and Edward attempt to conceal the company's debt from the board members. [S]

programme.title: Saddle Up!
programme.desc: Rage at Dawn begins another afternoon of western delights. James Stephens introduces the 1955 film which features Randolph Scott in the lead opposite Forrest Tucker as the villain. [S]

programme.title: Rage at Dawn
programme.desc: 1955. Western. Directed by Tim Whelan. Stars Randolph Scott, Forrest Tucker & Mala Powers. A private detective from Chicago is sent out west to take down the notorious Reno brothers. [S]

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp
programme.desc: Rich Man's Son. 1955. Stars Hugh O'Brian, Lee Erickson & Don Haggerty. The son of a railway executive runs away to become a gun toting ranch hand, but Wyatt teaches him some important lessons. [S]

programme.title: The Adventures of Jim Bowie
programme.desc: Deputy Sheriff. 1956. Stars Scott Forbes, Maurice Marsac & Celia Lovsky. Jim volunteers to become a deputy sheriff to protect a prisoner, the son of a French society member, from mob violence. [S]

programme.title: 26 Men
programme.desc: Border Incident. 1957. Stars Tristram Coffin, Rico Alaniz & Lane Bradford. Clint Travis goes undercover as a gun smuggler to stop a Mexican revolutionary's plans to topple the Mexican government. [S]

programme.title: The Texan
programme.desc: The Lord Will Provide. 1958. Stars Rory Calhoun & Ellen Corby. After Bill rescues a reverend, he learns of a town with a reputation for killing men of the cloth and heads there to investigate. [S]

programme.title: Z-Cars
programme.desc: In Police Hands. 1974. Stars Brigid Erin Bates, John Oxley & Douglas Fielding. Julie and Dave are happy, then they're in the nick. It seems that simply being in love these days is a crime. [S]

programme.title: The Human Jungle
programme.desc: Enemy Outside. 1965. Stars Herbert Lom. Two men in the same hospital ward give Drs Corder and Davis a problem that trembles on the brink of catastrophe. Guest stars Tony Tanner. [S]

programme.title: Maigret
programme.desc: Maigret at the Majestic. 1993. Stars Bruno Cremer, Jérôme Deschamps & Marilu Marini. After a guest at the Hotel Majestic is strangled, Maigret takes on the difficulties of the complex case. [S]

programme.title: Smokescreen (1964)
programme.desc: 1964. Drama. Directed by Jim O'Connolly. Starring Peter Vaughan, John Carson & Yvonne Romain. A blazing car goes over the cliff to the east of Brighton. Suspicions mount when no body can be found. [S]

programme.desc: Rainy Day / Playdate: Emma's pretending to be Lucky Dog by wearing her rainboots on her hands. Eva comes over to play with Emma but she refuses to take out her dummy. (S1 Ep8)

programme.title: Masha And The Bear
programme.desc: How They Met: Far away in a little house by the railroad lives a very restless little girl called Masha. One day, she discovers the Bear's house and decides to play in it! (S1 Ep1)

programme.title: Masha And The Bear
programme.desc: Don't Wake Till Spring!: The Bear prepares for his winter bedtime by barricading himself from Masha inside the house. (S1 Ep2)

programme.title: Masha And The Bear
programme.desc: One, Two, Three! Light the Christmas Tree!: The Bear adores Christmas so much he wakes up just to celebrate the holiday. He cleans his house, decorates the tree and waits for Father Frost. (S1 Ep3)

programme.title: Masha And The Bear
programme.desc: Tracks of Unknown Animals: First snow falls and the Bear decides to teach Masha how to distinguish the tracks of different animals. (S1 Ep4)

programme.title: Masha And The Bear
programme.desc: Prances with Wolves: The wolves that live in the forest come up with a plan to kidnap Masha and demand the Bear pay a ransom. (S1 Ep5)

programme.title: Masha And The Bear
programme.desc: Jam Day: The Bear decides to harvest berries and cook jam. This idea literally lives up to Masha's taste. (S1 Ep6)

programme.title: Masha And The Bear
programme.desc: Springtime for Bear: The Bear wakes up with the arrival of spring. While running around the forest, he stumbles upon a beautiful female bear. He quickly falls in love. (S1 Ep7)

programme.title: Masha And The Bear
programme.desc: Gone Fishing: The Bear goes fishing. He slings his fishing rod, but as soon as the first fish swallows the bait, Masha appears and transforms a pleasant fishing trip into a nightmare. (S1 Ep8)

programme.title: Masha And The Bear
programme.desc: Call Me Please!: The Bear wants to watch a football game, but first he needs to get rid of the girl. The Bear sends her on a walk to the forest and gives her a mobile phone to be safe. (S1 Ep9)

programme.title: Care Bears: The Bad Crowd Strikes Back!
programme.desc: ...Strikes Back!: A giant flying saucer has begun to intercept all the caring coming from Earth, meaning Care-a-Lot is starting to wither away. The bears blast off into space to see what's going on.

programme.title: A Go! Go! Cory Carson Halloween
programme.desc: ...Halloween: Cory vows to keep Chrissy safe on Halloween, but his quest for a King Size Candy Bar gets in the way.

programme.title: PJ Masks
programme.desc: Orticia and the Pumpkins: When Orticia send Gekko's Pumpkins bad, Gekko is desperate to stop them. (S5 Ep14)

programme.title: Pikwik Pack
programme.desc: Hazel's Halloween: It's Halloween and the Pikwik Pack is getting into the spirit! Except Hazel. But on the way to the Halloween party, Hazel learns how fun it can be to use your imagination. (S1 Ep24)

programme.title: Masha And The Bear: Nursery Rhymes
programme.desc: ...Nursery Rhymes. Spooky Song: On a spooky night, Masha's new song helps both bunny and Rosie become super-brave! Because being scared together is not scary at all, but terribly fun! (S1 Ep24)

programme.title: DinoCity
programme.desc: Very Scary: What can be scarier than stories told late at night, in a tent, by the lamplight? Ricky, Tyra, and Boo get together to scare each other and have fun. (S2 Ep25)

programme.title: The Miniwhats
programme.desc: The Witch Who Fell From The Sky: Raoul wakes up from a nightmare, and Ollie is drawing a forest. Suddenly, a little girl seems to fall from the sky. (S1 Ep15)

programme.title: Masha And The Bear
programme.desc: Think Outside the Box: Masha and Penguin go to Mars and from there they go straight to the open sea to the Frog Princess, and new adventures are already waiting for friends overboard. (S6 Ep5)

programme.title: Masha And The Bear
programme.desc: Well-beeing: What happens when bees overeat chocolates? Masha becomes their personal trainer! Get ready! Let's start weight loss exercises! (S6 Ep6)

programme.title: Masha And The Bear
programme.desc: Knock-knock-knock: The mysterious night visitor frightened the Bear and made a real mess in his house. But Masha knows the best way to overcome fear is to play with an invisible house spirit! (S6 Ep7)

programme.title: Masha And The Bear
programme.desc: Unfriended?: Red or yellow? Masha and the Bear argued which colour is more beautiful, and a wall grew between them. All this turns into exhausting competition of searching new friends. (S6 Ep8)

programme.title: Masha And The Bear
programme.desc: Shower Power: When forest orderlies are powerless, dealing with a real epidemic is not an easy task. But Masha gets down to business, the main thing is perky laughter! (S6 Ep9)

programme.title: Masha And The Bear
programme.desc: Fisherman's Luck: The Bear has a rival for fishing - a Cat with the latest equipment. An unspoken competition begins. Will it be the latest technology, a time-tested method or... Masha? (S6 Ep10)

programme.title: Masha And The Bear
programme.desc: Like Mother, Like daughter: Masha is playing mother and daughter with Rosie. But this time an honest lot distributed the roles. It's Masha's turn to put on her cap and get in the stroller. (S6 Ep11)

programme.title: Masha And The Bear
programme.desc: Blown Away: Masha finds someone's umbrella in the forest and decides to urgently return it. After a fun search, the owner of the umbrella is found, but why is he so dissatisfied? (S6 Ep12)

programme.title: Masha And The Bear
programme.desc: Who's Gifted?: Christmas is a time of miracles and gifts. All inhabitants prepared performances for Santa Claus, but Masha was the best prepared. Does the wizard have enough gifts for her? (S6 Ep13)

programme.title: Jeremy and Jazzy
programme.desc: Halloween Bear: It's hard to find a scary costume, until this little bear takes a surprising step! (S1 Ep34)

programme.title: Jeremy and Jazzy
programme.desc: Five Little Pumpkins: Countdown from five with some scared little pumpkins on Hallowe'en night! (S1 Ep9)

programme.title: PJ Masks
programme.desc: Orticia and the Pumpkins: When Orticia send Gekko's Pumpkins bad, Gekko is desperate to stop them. (S5 Ep14)

programme.title: Gus - The Itsy Bitsy Knight
programme.desc: The Ghost of Karamel: Gus has been crying wolf so often that when he claims he's met a ghost who needs his help, nobody believes him. (S1 Ep46)

programme.title: Masha And The Bear
programme.desc: Happily Feather After: Spring has dawned, the birds have arrived! But a pigeon settles in the birdhouse near Bear's house, and Masha makes him her new pet. (S5 Ep24)

programme.title: Masha And The Bear
programme.desc: Fast And Furrryous: Bear has made a new purchase: he's bought a motorcycle! Now as a cool biker, he plans on impressing She-Bear, but she doesn't seem to like it very much. (S5 Ep25)

programme.title: Masha And The Bear
programme.desc: Unbearable Beach: On a nice summer's day Bear, as usual, goes fishing. But the fishing trip didn't quite work out: the forest dwellers made a "beach" at Bear's favourite spot. (S5 Ep26)

programme.title: Masha And The Bear
programme.desc: When a Pig Flies: Rosie has lost her peace because of the ripe, appetising acorns growing right above her little snout. (S6 Ep1)

programme.title: Masha And The Bear
programme.desc: All You Need is a Goal: The ball is on the field, the players are in the field, the Bear in the chair is rooting for his favourite team. But Masha got bored in anticipation of a goal. (S6 Ep2)

programme.title: Masha And The Bear
programme.desc: Soup Pursuit: The wolves are going to cook borscht under Masha's guidance. They have a cookbook, a big pot and a ravenous appetite. But they still gotta get the ingredients! (S6 Ep3)

programme.title: Masha And The Bear
programme.desc: Tricky Tricks: Bear's old circus friend Tiger comes to visit. What could be more wonderful than to passionately play chess with your best friend? But Masha has her own idea of miracles. (S6 Ep4)

programme.title: Masha And The Bear
programme.desc: Think Outside the Box: Masha and Penguin go to Mars and from there they go straight to the open sea to the Frog Princess, and new adventures are already waiting for friends overboard. (S6 Ep5)

programme.title: Hello Kitty: Super Style!
programme.desc: The Ghost of Cherry Town: Badtz Maru claims he saw a ghost, but no one believes him due to his history of telling tall tales. Detective Kitty is on the case! (S1 Ep51)

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcake: Berry in the Big City
programme.desc: ... the Big City: The Ghosts of Cupcakes Past/Fright-Fall: Strawberry Shortcake has big dreams to 'bake the world a better place" which is why she is headed to BIG APPLE CITY! (S1 Ep104)

programme.title: Masha's Tales
programme.desc: The Three Little Pigs: Masha gives a kid's perspective on the traditional tale of 'The Three Little Pigs'. (S1 Ep13)

programme.title: Masha's Tales
programme.desc: The Valiant Little Tailor: The tale of 'The Valiant Little Tailor' gets a revisited version made by young Masha. (S1 Ep14)

programme.title: Masha's Tales
programme.desc: Ali Baba: Told through her eyes, Masha shares her version of 'Ali Baba'. (S1 Ep15)

programme.title: Barbie And Chelsea: The Lost Birthday

programme.title: Little Bear
programme.desc: Cultivating Patience: Pompon thinks that the more the seed is watered, the faster it will grow. So he diverts the water from the lake to the pumpkin patch. Watch out for floods! (S1 Ep17)

programme.title: Masha And The Bear
programme.desc: First Day of School: With the beginning of September, Masha wants to go to school and asks the Bear to build a school for her. (S1 Ep11)

programme.title: Masha And The Bear
programme.desc: No Trespassing: The Bear patiently waits to collect the harvest of carrots - as does the hungry hare. (S1 Ep12)

programme.title: Masha And The Bear
programme.desc: Hide and Seek is Not for the Weak: Masha wants to play hide and seek, but the Bear has other plans. Knowing that it is impossible to go against her wishes, he agrees to play with her. (S1 Ep13)

programme.title: Masha And The Bear
programme.desc: Watch Out!: The Bear wakes up in his chair with an enormous bump on his head and a biathlon cup - but he can't remember how it all happened. (S1 Ep14)

programme.title: Masha And The Bear
programme.desc: Little Cousin: The Bear's little cousin, Panda, comes over to pay a visit. Masha immediately wants to pal up and spend time playing games. (S1 Ep15)

programme.title: Masha And The Bear
programme.desc: Get Well Soon!: Tired from Masha's endless games, the Bear pretends to be sick so the little girl will leave him alone. (S1 Ep16)

programme.title: Masha And The Bear
programme.desc: Recipe for Disaster: The Bear plays draughts. Masha interrupts him asking for food. The Bear cooks some porridge for her but Masha doesn't like it. (S1 Ep17)

programme.title: Masha And The Bear
programme.desc: Laundry Day: The Bear decides to hang up his laundry in his yard, but soon has to pull Masha from a puddle and a jar of jam. (S1 Ep18)

programme.title: Masha And The Bear
programme.desc: The Grand Piano Lesson: The Bear finds a beautiful black piano in the forest. He happily takes it home, fixes and tunes it, and begins to play some music. (S1 Ep19)

programme.title: Simon
programme.desc: A Mission for Super Elvis!: Gaspard has lost his blankie - impossible to find it! And boy, is he desperate! But Simon has an idea... (S4 Ep19)

programme.title: Simon
programme.desc: The Ant Colony: Simon and Lou are closely watching a colony of ants. Renaud, the older boy, is constantly interrupting them by kicking his ball near the ant colony. (S4 Ep20)

programme.title: Simon
programme.desc: Bring On The Mega Space Ships!: Simon is playing with Lou in the school yard. They are flying the paper airplanes they have made. But Simon's plane keeps flopping. (S4 Ep21)

programme.title: Simon
programme.desc: Super Elvis The Hero Dog: Simon is building a Kapla tower (a wooden plank construction set for kids) in the yard. Gaspard, running around with Elvis, knocks it over. (S4 Ep22)

programme.title: Simon
programme.desc: Professor Wolf's Game: Simon and Lou want to play with their toy figurines, but Gaspard really wants them to play hide-and-seek. He is convinced that Simon and Lou will never find him. (S4 Ep23)

programme.title: Simon
programme.desc: The Mega Strawberry Share Out: Simon and Gaspard are having a tough time sharing their marbles. Grandpa tells them to stop fighting and to go pick strawberries instead. (S4 Ep24)

programme.title: Hello Kitty: Super Style!
programme.desc: Key to a Legend: PI finds a mysterious key in the museum. Detective Kitty helps him search for the door it opens, while Frido plots to steal the key, and the treasure it might bring. (S1 Ep25)

programme.title: Hello Kitty: Super Style!
programme.desc: Goodbye Kitty: Keroppi invites Kitty to join him on a trip around the world. But her friends panic about her leaving and use up Kitty's precious time to pack. (S1 Ep26)

programme.title: Hello Kitty: Super Style!
programme.desc: Daredevil Rio: Rio asks Keroppi to hypnotise him to be brave. It works too well and Rio ends up in danger. Athlete Kitty helps him find the courage that was always in him. (S1 Ep27)

programme.title: Hello Kitty: Super Style!
programme.desc: Team Up Time: Frido and Pinky get upset when they don't get to play on the same soccer team as their best friends. It's up to Athlete Kitty to help Pinky and Frido win the game as a team! (S1 Ep28)

programme.title: Masha And The Bear
programme.desc: Home Improvement: The Bear's idea to hang a new picture frame on the wall ends with a huge explosion. The Bear has to start repairs. (S1 Ep26)

programme.title: Masha And The Bear
programme.desc: Pasta La Vista: Who is the best cook in all the forest? Masha or Dasha? As usual, Bear will have to solve the girls' dispute. (S5 Ep14)

programme.title: Masha And The Bear
programme.desc: Love Is In The Bear: Ah, love! Bear prepares a gift for the Lady Bear and dreams of winning her heart. But Masha is also here! Will her interference in the affairs of the heart lead to? (S5 Ep15)

programme.title: Masha And The Bear
programme.desc: Wish Upon A Star: Wow, it's another New Year! Masha has a lot of experience in organising unforgettable celebrations, so she takes matters into her own hands. (S5 Ep16)

programme.title: Masha And The Bear
programme.desc: Firefighter of the Day: Wow, that's really something! Masha saves Bear from a fire! And a grateful Bear makes her a gift - a toy fire truck. (S5 Ep17)

programme.title: Masha And The Bear
programme.desc: Awesome Blossoms: Bear's garden has been overtaken by dandelions! As Bear fighting against the weeds, Masha doesn't get why he is throwing them away. After all, dandelions can be beautiful! (S5 Ep18)

programme.title: Gigantosaurus
programme.desc: The Perfect Bone: When Rugo and Ignatius each find the same semicircle-shaped bone, they both think it's perfect for different reasons. (S3 Ep8)

programme.title: Gigantosaurus
programme.desc: Friendship Cards: Tiny is tired of dinos not getting along in Cretacia! So she invents a game called Friendship Cards, which pairs one dino with another they have nothing in common. (S3 Ep9)

programme.title: Gigantosaurus
programme.desc: Tiny Tells: When Tiny warns everyone about a small volcanic eruption, she likes the attention she gets from announcing the news. So she decides to start a news service. (S3 Ep10)

programme.title: Gigantosaurus
programme.desc: The Tooth Fairy: Rocky is so excited when he witnesses Giganto losing a tooth because that means the Tooth Fairy will visit and leave loot! (S3 Ep11)

programme.title: Gigantosaurus
programme.desc: The Missing Manual: When Patchy discovers Mazu keeps a record of everything she knows in her Gigantopedia, he just has to borrow it for a while. It feels great to be smart! (S3 Ep12)

programme.title: Great Continental Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Vienna to Trieste: Michael Portillo travels the Habsburg imperial line from Vienna across the impressive Semmering Pass, a railway line through the Alps, as he heads toward Trieste. [S]

programme.title: Secrets of the London Underground
programme.desc: Charing Cross: Tim Dunn and Siddy Holloway explore the disused Jubilee line areas of Charing Cross station, now more famous as a film location. [S,AD]

programme.title: Secrets of the London Underground
programme.desc: Waterloo and City: Tim Dunn and Siddy Holloway discover the hidden world of the Waterloo and City, the only line entirely underground. [S,AD]

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Shopping from Home.

programme.title: Great Continental Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Stockholm to the Arctic Circle: Michael Portillo embarks on a scenic thousand-mile rail journey from the Swedish capital, Stockholm, to Abisko in the Arctic Circle. [S]

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Oxford to Abingdon: Michael Portillo sets out on another railway adventure as he explores Britain between the world wars, beginning a tour of the Home Counties and beyond in Oxford. [S]

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Stoke Mandeville to Beaconsfield: Michael Portillo continues his travels through England's Home Counties at Stoke Mandeville in Buckinghamshire, before making his way to Beaconsfield. [S]

programme.title: Abandoned Engineering
programme.desc: Silo City: A real-life concrete jungle in America's 'Rust Belt', and an industrial facility that brought energy to a remote corner of the world. [S,AD]

programme.title: Abandoned Engineering
programme.desc: Inside Man: A Middle Eastern region littered with ruins was the site of an extraordinary deception, and a strange facility in Taiwan struck fear into those who knew its true purpose. [S,AD]

programme.title: Narrow Escapes of World War II
programme.desc: Roy Urqhart's Escape from Arnhem: Major-General 'Roy' Urquhart led the doomed British attack on Arnhem, but somehow made it back across the Rhine, dodging enemy gunfire and patrols. [S,AD]

programme.title: World War Weird
programme.desc: The Germans hear that Polish forces are fighting alongside a huge bear. Tales of this beer-swilling, chain-smoking beast terrify them - but incredibly the stories are true. [S]

programme.title: Great Canal Journeys
programme.desc: Italy: Timothy West and Prunella Scales explore the Naviglio Grande Canal in Italy, stopping along the way at the Swiss lakeside town of Locarno and the gardens of Isola Bella. [S]

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Christmas Special: Fiona Bruce presents highlights and updates on items that have appeared over the past few months, including a piece of Banksy art and a Fabergé egg. [S]

programme.title: Bangers & Cash: Restoring Classics
programme.desc: Puch: A super-rare Renault Clio Williams 2 in F1 blue with contrasting gold alloys has turned Dave Mathewson an interesting shade of green. [S,AD]

programme.title: Bangers & Cash: Restoring Classics
programme.desc: Saab: The team snap up a slightly saggy Seventies Saab 96, but despite a stunning restoration, could it result in a record financial loss when it goes to auction? [S,AD]

programme.title: Narrow Escapes of World War II
programme.desc: Morshead Holds Tobruk: Courageous wartime tales. Australian Leslie Morshead and his troops held off Rommel's Afrika Korps at the crucial port of Tobruk for an astonishing eight weeks. [S,AD]

programme.title: The Buildings That Fought Hitler
programme.desc: We Shall Fight On The Beaches: Rob Bell explores the coastal defence network built to defend Britain's beaches, including a tower in Essex which controlled mines laid across the estuary. [S,AD]

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Christmas Special: Fiona Bruce presents highlights and updates on items that have appeared over the past few months, including a piece of Banksy art and a Fabergé egg. [S]

programme.title: Guy Martin's Lancaster Bomber
programme.desc: New. The history enthusiast honours Lancaster bomber crews of the Second World War as he tries out several onboard roles including pilot, gunner, and 'bomb aimer'. [S]

programme.title: Bangers & Cash: Restoring Classics
programme.desc: Lotus Esprit: Dave alerts the team's to a 1979 Lotus Esprit S3. It's an expensive buy and a serious risk, but it's also a thoroughbred classic in need of a proper recommission. [S,AD]

programme.title: Bangers & Cash
programme.desc: Derek heads to County Durham where Neil Walker is reluctantly letting his late dad's car collection go, including a Japanese take on a classic British Jag; the Mitsuoka Viewt. [S,AD]

programme.title: Bangers & Cash: Restoring Classics
programme.desc: Puch: A super-rare Renault Clio Williams 2 in F1 blue with contrasting gold alloys has turned Dave Mathewson an interesting shade of green. [S,AD]

programme.title: Great Continental Railway Journeys

programme.title: Secrets of the London Underground

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Farnborough to Winchester: Michael Portillo heads for Farnborough, Hampshire, famous today for its airshow and home to what was then the Royal Aircraft Establishment. [S]

programme.desc: Catastrophe And Coverup: A volcanic island just off Taiwan containing chilling ruins from its darkest era, and a miniature railway that lies forgotten in the woods of Arkansas USA. [S,AD]
